text: [Yusuf] otvetil: "Ne uspeyut prinesti yedu, kotoroy vas kormyat zdes', kak ya rastolkuyu vashi snovideniya. [I vy uznayete ob etom] do togo, kak vam podadut yeye, blagodarya tomu, chemu nauchil menya moy Gospod'. Voistinu, ya otreksya ot lyudey, kotoryye ne veruyut v Allakha i ne priyemlyut very v budushchuyu zhizn'
